text:
Charlestown / Boston, MA - Local, Fulltime - Software Engineers (Mid and Senior) and Senior Sysadmin

Help Tingo.com and SmarterTravel change the hotel booking industry by taking the gamble out of booking. We're looking for experienced developers, preferable with some Java or PHP background. We're also looking for a senior Linux sysadmin with Puppet experience.

http://www.smartertravelmedia.com/careers/apply_now
